messages.subject: Re: shyrley's bitchin'
messages.messageBody:
****<We learned our lesson from California. We bitched constantly about
EVERYTHING
there, but after we left, we realized how much fun we had---and what we
really missed. We decided NOT to do that again, and we enjoyed our other

tours SO much more! We seem to REALLY enjoy going back out to California

whenever we can! ****

I know I don't post very much and most people might not recognize my
name, but I'm in California! And we love unschoolers from everywhere to
visit.

Our corner of CA is beautiful (on the coast almost right in the middle),
we are near Hearst Castle, Cambria (wonderful artsy town), Big Sur (ok a
few hours drive), San Luis Obispo, Avila Beach (one of the best kids
beaches ever), Santa Barbara (for famous people watching), etc...

Just let us know when anyone on this list wants to visit! I love
showing off my part of the world.

Kate
mom to Robin (8) and Storey (5 1/2)
